analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa chung ngu dang 'bring po ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spong ba ni 'bad pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Among them, the non-arising of small and medium afflictions and the abandonment of those that have arisen is called exertion.

original: nyon mongs pa chen po rnams ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spong ba ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa chen po rnams ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spong ba ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa zhes bya'o //

translated: Among them, one sees that the non-arising of unarisen evil unwholesome dharmas and the abandonment of those that have arisen are the distraction of the mind.

analyzed: de'i tshe zhi gnas bsgom zhing sems rtse gcig tu sbyor bar byed pa ni /
translated: At that time, the cultivation of serenity and the application of the mind to one-pointedness

original: sems rab tu 'dzin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems rab tu 'dzin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: is called the ‚Äúperfect fixation of the mind.‚Äù

original: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa ni mi skyed pa dang / skyes pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'i tshe /üîΩsems gnyis dang rmugs pas non cing nang du 'dus par mthong ba'am /
analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa ni mi skyed pa dang / skyes pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'i tshe / sems gnyis dang rmugs pas non cing nang du 'dus par mthong ba'am /
translated: When one is engaged in order to prevent the arising of non-virtuous dharmas that have not yet arisen and to abandon those that have arisen,üîΩif one sees that the mind is overcome by the two, laziness and drowsiness, and is withdrawn inward,

original: zhum pa skye bar dogs pa skye ba'i tshe /
analyzed: zhum pa skye bar dogs pa skye ba'i tshe /

original: sems gzengs mthos par 'gyur ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan nam /
analyzed: sems gzengs mthos par 'gyur ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan nam /

original: bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yid la byed pa'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yid la byed pa'am /
translated: or the results of meditative concentration,

analyzed: lhag mthong bsgom zhing gnyid dang rmugs pa sel bar byed pa ni yang dag par smon pa zhes bya'o //
translated: or one should cultivate insight and dispel drowsiness and laziness. This is called ‚Äúperfect aspiration.‚Äù

original: yang dag pa'i spong ba gsum pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i spong ba gsum pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the third perfect abandonment,

analyzed: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it says ‚Äúthe generation of virtuous dharmas that have not yet arisen‚Äù and so on.

analyzed: de la dge ba'i chos ni srog gcod pa las phyir ldog pa la sogs pa dge ba bcu'am /

original: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i bslab pa gsum mam /
analyzed: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i bslab pa gsum mam /

original: bslab gsum gyi rgyu ni bslab pa gsum nyam par gyu pa'i gyu las slar ldog na //
analyzed: bslab gsum gyi rgyu ni bslab pa gsum nyam par gyu pa'i gyu las slar ldog na //

analyzed: de dag skye bar 'gyur ba'i rgyur rig par bya'o // ma skyes pa ni chos de dag mngon du ma gyur pa'am /
translated: It should be understood as the cause of their arising.

original: sems ma byung ba'o //
analyzed: sems ma byung ba'o //
translated: Unarisen refers to those factors that have not yet occurred or have not yet arisen in the mind.

original: @150a * // skyes pa ni chos de dag mngon du sems la 'byung ba'i bya'o //
analyzed: @150a * // skyes pa ni chos de dag mngon du sems la 'byung ba'i bya'o //

original: de la gang dge ba'i chos ma thob pa dang mngon du ma gyur pa de dag myur du bdag gis thob pa dang / mngon du gyur par bya'o zhes 'dod pa cher skyes pa ni mos pa skyed ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la gang dge ba'i chos ma thob pa dang mngon du ma gyur pa de dag myur du bdag gis thob pa dang / mngon du gyur par bya'o zhes 'dod pa cher skyes pa ni mos pa skyed ces bya'o //
translated: With regard to that, the generation of interest is the great desire to quickly obtain and actualize those virtuous factors that have not been obtained and actualized.

original: 'bad cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sogs pa ni yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi po'i don dang sbyar zhing bstan dgos pa'i phyir bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bad cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sogs pa ni yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi po'i don dang sbyar zhing bstan dgos pa'i phyir bshad par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the four right efforts should be explained in order to show that they are connected with the four right efforts.

original: yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show the four right efforts,

original: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúthe wholesome states that have not yet arisen,‚Äù and so on.

analyzed: dge ba'i chos ni gang yang dag par spong ba gsum pa'i skabs su bshad pa rnams so //

analyzed: dge ba'i chos thob pa rnams mngon du byed pa ni gnas pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: mngon du bya ba rnam par rmongs par ma gyur cing sems la gsal bar byed pa ni mi brjed pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: mi brjed pa rnams mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis ma phrogs pa ni mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o //

translated: Thus, the cultivation of the virtues that have been acquired, the practice of them, and the bringing them to fullness and perfection is called cultivation, greatness, and completion.

original: dge ba'i chos skyes pa'i 'di dag gnas nas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i 'dod pa cher skyes pa ni mos pa skyed pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos skyes pa'i 'di dag gnas nas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i 'dod pa cher skyes pa ni mos pa skyed pa'o //

analyzed: de la dge ba'i chos rnyed pa rnams mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa ni 'bad pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: dge ba'i chos ma rnyed pa rnams rnyed par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: dge ba'i chos de nyid bsgom pa dang / rgya cher byed pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o //

original: yang na dge ba rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: yang na dge ba rnam pa gsum ste /

analyzed: chung ngu dang / 'bring po dang chen po'o //

translated: Among them, the production of small and middling wholesome dharmas that have not yet arisen, and the abiding, non-forgetting, and non-loss of those that have arisen is called effort.

original: dge ba'i chos chen po ma skyes pa rnams skyed par byed la /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos chen po ma skyes pa rnams skyed par byed la /
translated: The production of great wholesome dharmas that have not yet arisen,

original: skyes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rgyas pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: skyes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rgyas pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and the practice, expansion, and completion of those that have arisen is called the undertaking of striving.

analyzed: dge ba'i chos de dag bsgom pa'i tshe sems g-yengs par gyur pa na zhi gnas bsgom zhing sems rtse gcig tu 'jog par byed pa ni sems rab tu @150b 'dzin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: When one is cultivating those virtuous qualities, if the mind becomes distracted, one should cultivate meditative serenity and settle the mind in one-pointed concentration. This is called ‚Äúthoroughly controlling the mind.‚Äù

original: de'i tshe rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non te /
analyzed: de'i tshe rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non te /
translated: At that time, if one is overcome by lethargy and sleepiness,

original: sems zhum par gyur pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan nam bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yid la byas nas sems gzengs bstod pa'am /
analyzed: sems zhum par gyur pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan nam bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yid la byas nas sems gzengs bstod pa'am /
translated: and the mind becomes depressed, one should uplift the mind by bringing to mind the good qualities of the TathƒÅgatas or the benefits of meditative concentration.

analyzed: lhag mthong bsgoms pa las rmugs pa dang gnyid sel bar byed pa ni yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o //

original: de la yang dag par spong ba bzhis mdor na chos nyid bstan te /
analyzed: de la yang dag par spong ba bzhis mdor na chos nyid bstan te /
translated: In brief, the four correct abandonings teach the nature of phenomena

analyzed: nag pa'i phyogs dang dkar po'i phyogs so /

original: de la sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spong ba ni nag po'i phyogs so //
analyzed: de la sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spong ba ni nag po'i phyogs so //
translated: The dark side is the non-arising of non-virtuous phenomena that have not yet arisen, the abandonment of those that have arisen,

analyzed: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa skyed pa dang / skye pa rnams gnas par byed pa ni dkar po'i phyogs so// de lta yin pa las spong ba rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis ni /

original: bzhi char yang dag par spong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bzhi char yang dag par spong bar 'gyur te /
translated: In this way, the four right efforts are made by means of the method of the four abandonments.

original: spong ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: spong ba rnam pa bzhi ste /

analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos sems la mngon du byung ba de med pa yin pa spang ba ste /
translated: ‚Äù The non-virtuous factors that have appeared in the mind are eliminated.

original: de mngon du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de mngon du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to prevent their appearance,

analyzed: 'bad pa byed pa ni phyis mi skye bas spangs pas rab tu spong ba'o //

original: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
